mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO at_stock_take_line ( FID, FEntryID, FMaterialID, FMaterialNumber, FMaterialName, FMaterialTypeNumber, FMaterialTypeName, FUnit, FYkQty, FYkPrice, FYkAmount, FTzQty, FTzPrice, FTzAmount, FCGPrice, FStockID, FStockNumber, FStockName, FBatch, FNote, FZFQty, FQty ) VALUES
( #{entry.FID}, #{entry.FEntryID}, #{entry.FMaterialID}, #{entry.FMaterialNumber}, #{entry.FMaterialName}, #{entry.FMaterialTypeNumber}, #{entry.FMaterialTypeName}, #{entry.FUnit}, #{entry.FYkQty}, #{entry.FYkPrice}, #{entry.FYkAmount}, #{entry.FTzQty}, #{entry.FTzPrice}, #{entry.FTzAmount}, #{entry.FCGPrice}, #{entry.FStockID}, #{entry.FStockNumber}, #{entry.FStockName}, #{entry.FBatch}, #{entry.FNote}, #{entry.FZFQty}, #{entry.FQty} )
